channel.title: Coding With Matt
channel.description: Recent content on Coding With Matt

item.title: Chapter 01 Ground of Being in Swift
item.description: A comprehensive tour of Swift fundamentals covering statements, operators as functions, custom types (struct/class/enum), variables vs constants, scope and lifetime, namespaces, and access control with practical examples.

item.title: Moody
item.description: Create a single-screen app that lets the user select their mood and displays an icon and label to match.

item.title: Cat Press
item.description: Create a single-screen app with a button that prints ‘Meow’ to the console when tapped.

item.title: Self Guided Coding Lesson
item.description: if your new to writting code check out some of these pedagogical programming languages to get started

item.title: The Hungry Philosophers Problem
item.description: cool puzzle related to synchronization issues in concurrent programming.

item.title: March
item.description:
Week 13 Range: March 24, 2025 – March 30, 2025

March 24 - March 30

Monday

  • I like keeping track of the year using the current week number.
  • Lately I have been trying to learn the abacus. My goal this week is to improve my speed by continually adding the number 13.
  • My 30th is coming up and it would feel great to publish that update before saturday.
  • I have woke up for 4am for 5 days in a row. I have been sleeping around 6 hours lately. It is hard to get up but I am always happy I got up later.
  • It seems like my ideal morning routine is
    • make your bed
    • meditate
    • gym
    • program iOS

I am struggling to respect my new early bed time. Here I am at 9:46, 46 minutes late. I bought a 12 dollar doraemon alarm clock. You have to manually set it each night.

item.title: Waabl
item.description: a rarely updated and poorly organized account of my progress on my first iOS app

item.title: Learning Chinese Resources
item.description: links to websites that have helped me study Chinese
